name: C4D Shoppable Images
author: Coffee4dev.com

sections.description:
C4D Shoppable Images increases traffic through your website by creating shoppable images: images containing different points which link to various products.

Demo 1 Demo 2 Demo 3 Document Premium Support

FEATURES IN C4D Shoppable Images

  • Completely integrate with WooCommerce plugin
  • Using shortcode in page
  • Using shortcode in post
  • Using shortcode in widget
  • Using shortcode in pagebuilder Elementor, Bavebuilder, Visual Composer.
  • Display with slider style
  • Options for slider style
  • Display with grid style (4 columns, 3 columns, 2 columns, 1 column)
  • Option for grid
  • Drag & drop admin to create collection.
  • Support category, tags, single page.
  • Duplicate collection
  • Custom option to modify style of product title
  • Custom option to modify style of click icon
  • Custom option to modify style of product desc
  • Custom option to modify style of product images
  • Custom option to modify style of product button

INSTALLATION & CONFIG

  1. Upload c4d-shoppable-images to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

OPTION PAGE

To enable admin options please install C4D Plugin Manager plugin

MAY BE YOU NEED

C4D Woo Variation Images Display variation by image, color, text. Support add multi images for variations.
C4D Woocommerce Bundle Create frequently bought together product, sell bundle products with discount, promotion
C4D Woocommerce Boost Sales Auto create upsell, cross-sell product in mini cart, cart page, popup cart, thankyou, email.
C4D Woocommerce Filter Turn your shop into ajax filter without refresh page. Support all default widget of Woocommerce.
C4D Woocommerce Cart Create popup, side cart, support display cross-sell, upsell, related product in cart.

NEED SUPPORT OR CUSTOM

If you have question please contact us. Visit plugin website
sections.installation:
1. Upload c4d-shoppable-images to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Create collection in Shoppable Images -> Add New
  4. Insert shortcode in page or post, widget.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Added: update link document
  • Fixed: slider style does work

1.0.3

  • Added: update default button style

1.0.2

  • Added: button class for default button
  • Fixed: fix option for slider style

1.0.1

  • Added: duplicate collection function
  • Fixed: hover on product

1.0.0

  • Initial release
